name: CandyCook
0:
”Alexa, open Candy Cook.”
”Alexa, start Candy Cook.”
”Alexa, launch Candy Cook.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: candy cook
des:
Enter a new world, manage your Candy appliance in a simple and intuitive way. You can find the best function to cook your dishes and get support on how to keep your Cook in excellent condition. 
To use the full features set of Candy you must have purchased a Candy's Cook and have created an account using the Candy simply-Fi.

About this skill:
The skill supports the features available in the simply-Fi App. Be aware that since home appliance is not part of the Alexa Smart Home program, you’ll need to use “Candy Cook” as an Invocation Name to activate the skill. It means “Alexa open Candy Cook…” or “Alexa ask Candy Cook…”
This skill can be used only with compatible ovens (check the compatibility of your appliance on go.candy-group.com/candy-ov)

To get started:
Register your smart appliance using the simply-Fi App on your iOS or Android device.
In the App
Tapping on the icon with the four squares at the bottom left, you will find the "User Manual" section to download the guide to register the appliance to Alexa.
If you’re not familiar with the skill, simply start off by saying: 
“Alexa, ask Candy Cook what can I ask you” or “Alexa, open Candy Cook”, wait for the answer and then ask “what can I do?”

You can do many things like:
Discover how to prepare your dishes better.
Try saying: "Alexa, ask Candy Cook how do I cook cookies" otherwise “Alexa, open Candy Cook”, wait for the answer and then ask “how do I prepare crispy chicken?”

Know what a specific function consists of.
Ask to Alexa: "Alexa, ask Candy Cook what the Cooklight function is" or "Alexa, launch Candy Cook”, wait for the answer and then ask “what does the Softcook function do?"

Take care about your Cook.
Try saying: "Alexa, ask Candy Cook how do I clean the Cook" or "Alexa, open Candy Cook”, wait for the answer and then ask “how do I remove bad smells?”

Contacts
If you have any questions please contact Candy Support: Support@candy-hoover.com
